entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bow Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
